description:
Hakufu's dreams of participating in new fights and tournaments are put on hold as new obstacles block her path. Her friends have lost faith in her, new enemies appear, and a younger sister she never knew existed suddenly shows up on her doorstep. If Hakufu ever hopes to compete worldwide, she's going to have to deal with her issues at home first.

(Source: FUNimation)

tags.name: Super Power
tags.description: Prominently features characters with special abilities that allow them to do what would normally be physically or logically impossible.

tags.name: Martial Arts
tags.description: Centers around the use of traditional hand-to-hand combat.

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Tomboy
tags.description: Features a girl who exhibits characteristics or behaviors considered in many cultures to be typical of boys.

tags.name: Kuudere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who generally retains a cold, blunt and cynical exterior, but once one gets to know them, they have a very warm and loving interior.

tags.name: Nudity
tags.description: Features a character wearing no clothing or exposing intimate body parts.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

title.native: 一騎当千 Great Guardians バトルツアークラブ・セクシーコスプレ♥危険なアルバイト♥

node.description:
The founder and former representative director of [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102/).

**Non-anime roles:**
- Policeman in "Chuck E. Cheese in the Galaxy 5000"
Kouichi Oohata is a director and mecha designer best known for creating the Gunbuster from *Top wo Nerae!*

[Website](http://remi-stargarnet.net/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/Remi_Official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/remi_stargarnet/)

REMI is a female singer born in Tokyo, Japan. She is currently a member of [Sound Horizon](https://anilist.co/staff/100754/) and often works on [Yasuharu Takanashi](https://anilist.co/staff/100070)'s soundtracks.

[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/池田繁美)

Founder and representative director of Atelier Musa.
Tsutomu Miyazawa is an animator, storyboard artist, character and mechanical designer formerly affiliated with [Studio Kikan](https://anilist.co/studio/256/).

Originating from Studio Boomerang, currently affiliated with [ufotable](https://anilist.co/studio/43/). 

His role as a main animator on [Ikki Tousen: Dragon Destiny](https://anilist.co/anime/1956/) attracted a lot of attention. At ufotable he is one of the studio's key members among people like [Akira Matsushima](https://anilist.co/staff/119808/), [Masayuki Kunihiro](https://anilist.co/staff/146702/) and [Masaru Kimura](https://anilist.co/staff/146698/).

Held in high regard by [Yasuomi Umetsu](https://anilist.co/staff/101583/).

__Cousin:__ [Aaron Dismuke](https://anilist.co/staff/95254/Aaron-Dismuke)

__Justin Ryan Cook__ is an American voice actor, producer, line producer, ADR director and enginner who works for FUNimation.

**Non-anime staff credits:**
- Translation for "Dragon Ball Z: Budokai 3" (VG)
- Translation for "Dragon Ball Z: Budokai Tenkaichi" (VG)
__Tomokazu Tashiro__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).
__Tomokazu Tashiro__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).
